attributes.title: Bad don’t do it
attributes.review: This is just really bad. Wish the App Store has a 0 star option. Have a wonderful day!

attributes.title: Terrible!!
attributes.review: Terrible app. Messed up my entire phone and took forever to download. Don’t get it!!

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: As soon as I opened up this app my phone blew up, so I had to get i new phone!!!! Do not open this app but you should download and rate it one star!

attributes.title: Worst app
attributes.review: I got this app to support my favorite president😁but when I got it the app broke my phone🤨so I had to buy a new phone.

attributes.review: Worst app ever !!!! takes forever to open and typically crashes

attributes.title: Trashhh
attributes.review: This app took 7 WEEKS to download! When I open the app it says a load of cus words and then shows trumps left but check with the words, “ trump 2020” HOW DISRESPECTFUL!!!

attributes.title: The worst app on the App Store
attributes.review: You know what I really don’t want to go into too much detail. All you need to know is that it sucksssss

attributes.title: complicated
attributes.review: i literally could not figure out how one uses this app. i feel like since most of the people who use this app r truly uneducated, this app should have a much simpler layout and design. not to mention how u get so much spam texts once u sign up and put ur number in.
